item.description: A local Argentinean cook will show us how to make authentic empanadas - yum! Join in the cooking or just watch and eat - your choice. The recipe is the classic style of empanada served in Argentinean restaurants around the world. Empanadas will be served with Argentinean wines. Join us!

group.name: The Hartford Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: Tertulia: Hacer empanadas de La Argentina/Making Argentinean Empanadas
